LanguageData.CheatMenu.Shared.Message.SelectCellForCh: Select a map cell for {0}. Right-click to stop targeting.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Shared.Message.NoThings: No things found on that cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.SpawnThing.Label: Spawn Thing
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.SpawnThing.Description: Select a ThingDef, choose stack size (if stackable), then place it on the map.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.SpawnPawn.Label: Spawn Pawn
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.SpawnPawn.Description: Select a PawnKindDef, then place the generated pawn on the map.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.SelectWindow.Title: Select Thing To Spawn
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.SelectWindow.Search: Search by ThingDef label or defName.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.StackWindow.Title: Select Stack Count
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnThing.Message.PlaceFailed: Could not place {0} at that location.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnPawn.SelectWindow.Title: Select Pawn To Spawn
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnPawn.SelectWindow.SearchT: Search by pawn label, defName, or category.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.SpawnPawn.Message.PlaceFailed: Could not spawn {0} at that location.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralDestroy.Label: Destroy
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralDestroy.Descripti: Destroy all things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralKill.Label: Kill
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralKill.Description: Kill all things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralDamage10.Label: 10 Damage
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralDamage10.Descript: Deal 10 crush damage to all things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralDamageX.Label: Deal X Damage
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralDamageX.Descripti: Select a damage amount, then deal that crush damage to all things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.GeneralDamageX.Window.Title: Select Damage Amount
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralFinishAllResearch: Complete every research project and unhide all research entries.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralSetQuality.Label: Set Quality
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralSetQuality.Descri: Select a quality, then apply it to all quality-bearing things on the selected map cell.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralAwardHonor.Label: Award X Honor
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.GeneralAwardHonor.Descri: Select honor amount and faction, then target a pawn to award honor.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.GeneralAwardHonor.Window.Title: Select Honor Amount
LanguageData.CheatMenu.GeneralAwardHonor.Message.Sele: Select a pawn for {0}. Right-click to stop targeting.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.GeneralAwardHonor.Message.NoFa: No factions with royal titles are currently available.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.DoIncident.Label: Do Incident
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Cheat.DoIncident.Description: Open a searchable list of incidents and execute one immediately.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Incidents.Window.Title: Select Incident
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Incidents.Window.SearchTooltip: Search by incident label or defName.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Incidents.Message.NoTarget: No valid incident target is currently selected.
LanguageData.CheatMenu.Incidents.Message.TargetNotAll: {0} is not allowed for the current target.
